config.glowup.title: GlowUp Config
config.glowup.description.glowcolor: Set the color of the glow (RGB)
config.glowup.description.items: The items that will have an outline
config.glowup.description.togglemessageo: If enabled, the text that shows when using the toggle hotkey will appear above the hotbar instead of in chat
config.glowup.description.blacklistenabl: If this is enabled, all items will be glowing except the ones added to the blacklist
config.glowup.description.blacklistedite: The items that will not have an outline
